message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value and the benefits it brings, I propose a price of $7,500 for this exceptional item. I believe this is a fair offer that allows both of us to benefit.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counter with an offer of $6,500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and would like to provide some additional value while still maintaining a fair price for our product. Therefore, I am proposing a price of $7,000 for the product. This offer includes an exclusive bonus package tailored to enhance your experience with the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the value and the bonus package, I would like to counter with an offer of $6,800 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've taken into account your feedback and am now offering the product for $6,950. This price includes an extended warranty and priority customer support for a limited time. I believe this offer provides excellent value for you while allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin.
Considering the extended warranty and priority customer support, I would like to counter with an offer of $6,900 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I am willing to accept $6,925 for the product. This price includes the extended warranty and priority customer support, along with a small discount to help finalize the deal. I believe this is a mutually beneficial solution.
